item.title: 变压器供应紧张促使土耳其 Astor 公司向国外扩张
item.description: 土耳其变压器制造商 Astor Transformator Enerji 计划在西班牙和美国开设首家海外工厂，以帮助解决全球能源转型关键设备短缺的问题。【原文：Turkish transformer maker Astor Transformator Enerji plans to open its first factories abroad, in Spain and the US, to help address a global shortage of the devices that are key to the energy transition.】

item.title: Grifols 的 "恐怖年 "让分析师和卖空者意见不一
item.description: 西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 即将迎来有史以来最糟糕的一年，但一些分析师还不准备放弃这只一直是做空者最爱攻击目标的股票。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA is poised for its worst year on record, but some analysts aren’t ready yet to give up on a stock that’s been a favorite target of short sellers.】

item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. and Fidelity International are among investors who say the darkening economic outlook in Europe may force policymakers to cut interest rates more than the market expects.】

item.title: 印尼银行采取 "相当大胆 "的干预措施支撑印尼盾
item.description: 印尼盾兑美元汇率触及四个月低点并逼近16,000的关键水平，印尼央行周五加大了对市场的干预力度。【原文：Bank Indonesia intervened more aggressively in the market on Friday as the rupiah touched a four-month low and approached the key level of 16,000 against the dollar.】

item.title: 据说麦格理将竞购 Axiata 的电信基础设施部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management Pty）已经提交了一份竞购Axiata Group Bhd.电信基础设施部门的报价，交易价值约为35亿美元。【原文：Macquarie Asset Management Pty has submitted a bid to buy Axiata Group Bhd.’s telecom infrastructure unit in a transaction that could value it at about $3.5 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 韩国股市将收复戒严令惨败造成的损失
item.description: 韩国股票基准周五攀升，将收复因总统尹锡烈实施戒严令失败而引发的损失。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark climbed on Friday, set to recover losses triggered by President Yoon Suk Yeol’s failed bid to impose martial law.】

item.description:

The hotly anticipated game will feature Ciri, the adopted daugher of the original lead character

】

item.title: 韩国财政部长寻求让信用评级公司放心
item.description: 韩国财政部长致电主要信用评级公司的全球主权评级负责人，就韩国政治动荡可能造成的影响向他们作出保证。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister called the global heads of sovereign coverage at major credit rating firms to reassure them over the possible impact of the nation’s political turmoil.】

item.title: 中国持续通货紧缩对世界意味着什么？
item.description: 事实证明，中国陷入通货紧缩的漩涡难以收拾。这个世界第二大经济体的物价已连续六个季度下跌，如果再下跌一个季度，将创下上世纪 90 年代末亚洲金融危机时的通货紧缩纪录。【原文：China’s spiral into deflation is proving hard to fix. Prices in the world’s second-biggest economy have fallen for six consecutive quarters, and if they fall for one more quarter, the run would equal a record deflationary streak set in the Asian Financial Crisis in the late 1990s.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 马斯克致信美国证券交易委员会披露 Neuralink 调查情况，加剧了双方的争执
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四再次与美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）结怨，他在信中称，该机构正在调查他的脑机接口公司 Neuralink Corp.【原文：Elon Musk renewed his longstanding feud with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday by posting a letter that said the agency is investigating his brain-computer interface company, Neuralink Corp.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）寻求批准将得克萨斯州星际基地改建成新城
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正试图把太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）制造星际飞船火箭的德克萨斯州星际基地（Starbase）变成一座新城市，并把他的太空公司正式搬到那里。【原文：Elon Musk is attempting to turn the Starbase site in Texas where SpaceX builds its Starship rockets into a new city and officially move his space company there.】

item.title: 亨特称澳大利亚央行对就业市场和通胀的看法正在发生变化
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）周五表示，澳大利亚央行对劳动力市场的评估正在发生变化，因为如果偏离其中心设想，可能需要改变政策策略。【原文：Assessments by Australia’s central bank on the labor market are evolving, as a shift away from its central scenario may require a change in in policy strategy, Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said on Friday.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦交易所计划在 3 月前推出现金结算期货
item.description: 据巴基斯坦证券交易所有限公司新任命的首席执行官称，该公司正在考虑让交易商选择以现金结算期货交易，并计划在 3 月份进行测试。【原文：Pakistan Stock Exchange Ltd. is looking to give traders the option of settling futures deals in cash with testing planned by March, according to the newly appointed chief executive of the nation’s bourse.】

item.title: 关键会议未带来惊喜，中国股市下跌
item.description: 中国股市下跌，原因是中国政府再次让投资者猜测财政刺激政策的具体内容，尽管其关键政策会议誓言要刺激消费。【原文：Chinese shares declined as authorities again left investors guessing on the specifics of a fiscal stimulus even as their key policy meeting vowed to boost consumption.】

item.title: 弹劾案关键投票前韩国尹炳世支持率创新低
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈的支持率跌至上任以来的最低水平，他试图为自己宣布戒严令的行为辩护，并回击通过弹劾将其赶下台的努力。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol’s approval rating slid to its lowest level since he took office as he tried to defend his declaration of martial law and push back against efforts to oust him via impeachment.】

item.title: 中国央行收益率再创新低，CEWC加强宽松押注
item.description: 在一次重要的经济会议上，降息承诺使基准收益率创下历史新低，为中国债券的反弹注入了新的活力。【原文：China’s bond rally got a fresh shot in the arm from a key economic meeting, where promises of interest rate cuts helped send the benchmark yield to a fresh record low.】

item.title: 中国经济预计将在刺激政策启动后保持增长
item.description: 中国经济上个月很可能保持了增长势头，早期指标显示，随着一揽子广泛刺激措施的生效，中国经济将进一步企稳。【原文：China’s economy likely maintained momentum last month, with early indicators pointing to further stabilization as a broad package of stimulus measures took effect.】

item.title: 交易员权衡喜忧参半的美国数据和利率前景，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 在美联储今年最后一次政策会议召开之前，好坏参半的美国数据鼓励交易商获利了结，黄金维持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline after mixed US data encouraged traders to book profits ahead of the Federal Reserve’s final policy meeting of the year.】

item.title: 小米股价大涨 103%，电动汽车黑马股价再创新高
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）的股价正迅速逼近历史新高，该公司在拥挤的电动汽车市场上取得了重演其早先在智能手机领域的成功。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is rapidly closing in on a new all-time-high share price, having cracked the crowded market for electric vehicles in a repeat of its earlier success with smartphones.】

item.title: 最火爆的印度期权交易因打击而导致交易量下滑 90
item.description: 这还不到一个月，但限制措施对印度衍生品市场的影响已经显而易见。【原文：It’s barely been a month, and yet the impact of the curbs on India’s derivatives market is clear.】

item.title: 日本商业景气指数保持乐观，与日本央行观点一致
item.description: 日本大型企业的信心依然乐观，这与日本央行在下周政策会议前的看法基本一致。【原文：Confidence among Japan’s large firms remained upbeat, broadly in line with the Bank of Japan’s view ahead of a policy meeting next week that’s dividing analyst opinions over whether a rate hike is coming.】

item.title: 调查显示：英国消费者将放弃圣诞大采购
item.description: 一项调查显示，12 月份英国消费者信心依然低迷，在经济不确定性持续存在的情况下，家庭不愿在圣诞节前大手笔购买大件商品。【原文：UK consumer confidence remained subdued in December with households reluctant to splash out on big-ticket items ahead of Christmas amid ongoing economic uncertainty, a survey found.】

item.title: 晨星公司称，实力较弱的私人债务借款人将受到更多伤害
item.description: 晨星（Morningstar）的一份报告称，评级较低的私人信贷借款人明年预计将 "继续深陷泥潭"，因为他们将面临销售额下降、利润率减弱和借贷成本高企的困境。【原文：Lower-rated private credit borrowers are expected to “remain stuck in the mud” next year, as they stare down declining sales, weakened margins and high borrowing costs, according to a Morningstar report.】

item.title: 制裁前景抵消供应过剩问题，石油将实现周线上涨
item.description: 美国对伊朗和俄罗斯实施更严厉制裁的前景，消除了人们对明年全球石油供应过剩的持续担忧，从而推动石油价格上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a weekly advance as the prospect for tighter US sanctions against Iran and Russia countered persistent concerns around a sizeable global glut next year.】

item.title: Cantor Fitzgerald 因涉嫌滥用 SPAC 向 SEC 支付 675 万美元赔偿金
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会指控 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 在两家空头支票公司上市前误导投资者，Cantor Fitzgerald LP 同意支付 675 万美元和解。【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald LP agreed to pay $6.75 million to settle US Securities and Exchange allegations that it misled investors in two blank-check firms before their stock-market debuts.】

item.title: 投资者青睐日股新指标，估值低廉不再适用
item.description: 两年前，东京证券交易所发起了一场旨在整顿管理不善公司的运动，投资者纷纷涌入估值最低的公司。【原文：When the Tokyo Stock Exchange unveiled a campaign to whip poorly managed companies into shape two years ago, investors responded by piling into companies with the lowest valuations.】

item.title: 通胀加速后秘鲁将主要利率维持在 5
item.description: 秘鲁在 12 月份的会议上维持借贷成本不变，而上个月的总体和核心通胀率都有所加快。【原文：Peru kept borrowing costs unchanged at its December meeting, after both headline and core inflation accelerated last month.】

item.title: 高级顾问称日本必须应对特朗普关税并做好准备
item.description: 日本最高安全官员之一表示，东京需要为当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对中国、加拿大和墨西哥征收的关税做好准备，并调整供应链以减少对日本公司造成的附带损害。【原文：Tokyo needs to prepare for the tariffs President-elect Donald Trump has pledged against China, Canada and Mexico and adjust supply chains to reduce collateral damage on Japan Inc., according to one of the nation’s top security officials.】
